name: ProtTest
publications: Darriba D, Taboada GL, Doallo R, Posada D. ProtTest 3: fast selection of best-fit models of protein evolution. Bioinformatics, 27:1164-1165, 2011
Guindon S, Gascuel O. 2003. A simple, fast, and accurate algorithm to estimate large phylogenies by maximum likelihood. Syst Biol. 52: 696-704. Phyml
description: PROTTEST (ModelTest's relative) is a program based on Phyml for selecting the model of protein evolution that best fits a given set of sequences (alignment).
